duck: Scorpius is a constellation of the zodiac.
Scorpio (astrology) - Scorpio is the eighth astrological sign in the Zodiac, originating from the constellation of Scorpius.
A constellation in the Southern Hemisphere near Libra and Sagittarius, containing the bright red star Antares.

Corona Australis latmax = 40 latmin = 90 month = July notes= }} 'Scorpius', sometimes known as Scorpio, is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Its name is Latin for scorpion, and its symbol is (Unicode ). It lies between Libra to the west and Sagittarius to the east. It is a large constellation located in the southern hemisphere near the center of the Milky Way.
